name: Air Hockey Deluxe
description:
Enjoy all of your favorite moments of the playoffs with the No.1 exciting and fast paced table sports game, Air Hockey Deluxe!

Time to hit the ice with this No.1 Android version of Air Hockey game. Designed to deliver the amazing graphic quality of glow display, see and feel the real air hockey experience. With three levels of difficulty the computer can be a good match for anyone, from new comer to hockey expert! You can also play against a friend on the same device.

Game Features:
- Visually stunning glow graphics
- 1 Player (Classic and Timed) & 2 Players Mode
- 6 different set of tables, mallets and pucks
- Amazing game sound effects
